comment:
* A color filter that can be used to tint the source pixels using a single
 * color and a specific {@link BlendMode}.

methods.name: public int getColor()
methods.comment:
* Returns the ARGB color used to tint the source pixels when this filter
     * is applied.
     *
     * @see Color
     *

methods.name: public BlendMode getMode()
methods.comment:
* Returns the Porter-Duff mode used to composite this color filter's
     * color with the source pixel when this filter is applied.
     *
     * @see BlendMode
     *

methods.name: private static native long native_CreateBlendModeFilter(int srcColor, int blendmode)

methodNames: private static native long native_CreateBlendModeFilter(int srcColor, int blendmode)
